body: I keep the `raw_resize_` function and also add a `resize_` function (which checks sparse/dense dim invariants and thus safe) in `SparseTensorImpl.h` to give us more flexibility in dealing with sparse tensor sizes.
body_html: I keep the raw_resize_ function and also add a resize_ function (which checks sparse/dense dim invariants and thus safe) in SparseTensorImpl.h to give us more flexibility in dealing with sparse tensor sizes.
body_text: I keep the raw_resize_ function and also add a resize_ function (which checks sparse/dense dim invariants and thus safe) in SparseTensorImpl.h to give us more flexibility in dealing with sparse tensor sizes.
